backend/main.mo: Motoko canister with access‑controlled upload, download, and deletion of a stored project ZIP blob.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, and test IDs for admin-only project ZIP UI integration.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON mapping of frontend file paths to brief descriptions used as reference summaries for the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining light/dark OKLCH color tokens and applying global background and border styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that sets metadata, dark theme, root mount point, and loads the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app composing all site sections between Header and Footer in a single-page layout.
frontend/src/components/Community.tsx: Community section showing Discord, X, and Telegram CTAs with scroll-triggered animations and glowing UI effects.
frontend/src/components/Features.tsx: Features grid displaying four benefit cards with icons, descriptions, and responsive styling.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with site links, branding, and an admin-gated area that renders ProjectZipDownload when admin mode is enabled.
frontend/src/components/Gallery.tsx: Cinematic gallery showing six wolf-themed scene cards with animations and in-view transitions.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the site header with navigation links, wallet button, and a mobile menu toggle using smooth scroll behavior.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Displays the main hero section with parallax background, animated visuals, and CTA buttons for buying, joining, or reading the whitepaper.
frontend/src/components/MemeTokenomicsCh: Generates an animated interactive donut chart showing token distribution with hover effects and a responsive legend.
frontend/src/components/Presale.tsx: Shows presale phase information with countdown, token sale progress, and animated section transitions driven by configured phase constants.
frontend/src/components/ProjectZipDownlo: Provides admin‑gated controls to download or delete a backend‑generated project ZIP with loading, error, and status handling.
frontend/src/components/Roadmap.tsx: Displays a four‑phase animated roadmap timeline with icons, descriptions, and scroll‑triggered reveal effects.
frontend/src/components/Story.tsx: Animated story section with background imagery, reveal-on-scroll effects, and a featured scene image.
frontend/src/components/Tokenomics.tsx: Full tokenomics section including animated chart, allocation table, and whitepaper-style descriptions.
Builds an animated SVG donut chart with legend, using scroll visibility to trigger transitions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Fetches and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, recreating and invalidating queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useCountdown.ts: Provides a countdown timer hook that updates every second until a target date.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and auth-client lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useInView.ts: IntersectionObserver-based hook that flags when an element enters the viewport and stops observing afterward.
frontend/src/hooks/useLinearTokenProgres: Computes linear, time-based token sale progress with automatic per‑second updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useParallax.ts: Returns scroll‑based offset for parallax effects, respecting reduced‑motion preferences.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Example wrapper hook for react‑query using an authenticated actor to run backend queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme CSS variables for light/dark mode, and custom glow/animation utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/utils/adminGate.ts: Checks URL parameters to enable client-side admin mode visibility.
frontend/src/utils/projectZipDownload.ts: Creates a Blob from ZIP bytes and triggers a browser download with cleanup.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL params and persisting them in sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, radii, shadows, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature lists, and pending requests for ZIP download functionality.
